docs.lead_paragraph: Researchers report that viruses deprived of their usual channel for infiltrating the E. coli bacterium evolved a different route into the cells in little more than two weeks.

headline.seo: Study Finds Virus to Be Fast Learner on Infecting
headline.main: Study Finds Virus to Be Fast Learner on Infecting
headline.print_headline: Study Finds Virus to Be Fast Learner on Infecting

docs.abstract: Researchers report in journal Science that viruses deprived of their usual channel for infiltrating the E coli bacterium evolved a different route into the cells in little more than two weeks; new experiment provides a surprising glimpse at how easily viruses can evolve entirely new traits and thus give rise to new diseases.
docs.snippet: Researchers report that viruses deprived of their usual channel for infiltrating the E. coli bacterium evolved a different route into the cells in little more than two weeks.

docs.lead_paragraph: What keeps many rich countries from supporting government investments to alleviate extreme suffering?
docs.snippet: What keeps many rich countries from supporting government investments to alleviate extreme suffering?

headline.main: Have These Symptoms? Buy This Drug

docs.abstract: Checklists of symptoms have become a critical part of every major pharmaceutical marketing campaign, making it easy for patients to diagnose their own ailments -- and making it easy for drug makers to sell drugs.
docs.snippet: Checklists of symptoms have become a critical part of every major pharmaceutical marketing campaign, making it easy for patients to diagnose their own ailments -- and making it easy for drug makers to sell drugs.

docs.lead_paragraph: About one in 15 Americans is infected with oral human papillomavirus, a sexually transmitted virus that causes throat cancers, and the disease is especially common among men, new research shows.

headline.main: Oral HPV More Common in Men Than Women

docs.abstract: About one in 15 Americans is infected with oral human papillomavirus, a sexually transmitted virus that causes throat cancers, and the disease is especially common among men, new research shows.
docs.snippet: About one in 15 Americans is infected with oral human papillomavirus, a sexually transmitted virus that causes throat cancers, and the disease is especially common among men, new research shows.

docs.lead_paragraph: A federal expansion of a crime definition draws attention to victims in “a cultural blind spot.”

headline.seo: As Victims, Men Struggle for Rape Awareness

docs.abstract: Rape is widely thought of as a crime against women, but in a recent national survey, 1.4 percent of men said that they had been raped at some point, and studies have shown that as many as one in six men experienced unwanted sexual contact as minors; the federal government recently expanded its definition of rape to include a wider range of sexual assaults, including those against men, which will now be included in national crime statistics on rape.
docs.snippet: A federal expansion of a crime definition draws attention to victims in “a cultural blind spot.”

docs.lead_paragraph: What disgusts humans is proving irresistible to researchers exploring the evolutionary value of revulsion.

headline.seo: Disgust’s Evolutionary Role Is Irresistible to Researchers

docs.abstract: Human emotion of disgust, an emotion long neglected by psychologists, has become the subject of a flurry of new books and papers by scientists; evolutionary psychologists are now looking at disgust as an important and complicated adaptation to avoid disease-causing microbes and parasites that involves not only taste and smell but also sight and touch.
docs.snippet: What disgusts humans is proving irresistible to researchers exploring the evolutionary value of revulsion.

docs.lead_paragraph: Sudden pangs and strange sounds with no obvious cause.
